pages.text:
206 Miracle Mile, Coral Gables, FL 33134  |  Open Tuesday - Saturday 5pm | Open Sundays at 12pm  |  Bottomless Brunch Sundays 12pm
BEST BAR ON THE MILE
Inspired by the cocktails, music, and ambiance create the perfect chemical reaction for the ultimate nightlife experience. From craft cocktails to live music and entertainment, Copper 29 is known as the best bar and late night spot in Coral Gables, Florida. Located on the mile, where glam-our meets sophisticated, drawing a blend of local urban professionals and young socialites. Our dishes include gourmet burgers, truffle mac & cheese, wings and flatbread pizza. Learn more about Copper29’s daily promotions  by following them on Instagram at @copper29bar and Facebook at Copper 29 Bar.
